Description: The AACR’s Office of Science Policy and Government Affairs leads engagement efforts with policy makers in Washington, DC, on issues including federal investments in medical research, cross-government approaches to cancer prevention and research such as the Cancer Moonshot, and policy matters including reducing cancer disparities and the burden of tobacco related illness.  This session will highlight the AACR’s work on advocacy, collaborations with advocacy groups, and the tools available to assist AACR members in their advocacy before Congress.
SearchResultBody: DC04. Making Your Voices Heard: AACR's Advocacy Efforts with Policy Makers-Dedicated to the Memory of Chairman John Edward Porter
Title: Making Your Voices Heard: AACR's Advocacy Efforts with Policy Makers-Dedicated to the Memory of Chairman John Edward Porter
